code: import React,{useState,useRef}from'react';import TodoList from'./TodoList';import uuidv4 from'uuid/v4';function App(){const[todos,setTodos]=useState([]);const todoNameRef=useRef();function handleAddTodo(){const name=todoNameRef.current.value;if(name==='')return;setTodos(prevTodos=>{return[...prevTodos,{id:uuidv4(),name:name,complete:false}];});todoNameRef.current.value=null;}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(TodoList,{todos:todos}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{ref:todoNameRef,type:"text"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{onClick:handleAddTodo},"Add Todo"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",null,"Clear Completed Todos"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,"0 left to do "));}export default App;
